title: Chocolate strawberry Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['250g softened butter', '250g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon of vanilla extract', '250g self raising flour', '3 to 4 eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'Optional', '300ml double cream', '3 tablespoons of icing sugar', '2 tablespoons of jam', '1 packet of strawberries', '150g dark chocolate + extra', '100g white chocolate', '1 lemon', 'a handful of blackberries']
